fix soft delete when deleted_at column is mapped to *time.Time

listner: retry with backoff; log connection errors

orm: return pg.ErrNoRows from Update and Delete

fix connection leak in case tx begin error
orm: add Query and Exec to Model

orm: auto-quote custom table name if it is a keyword

IF NOT EXISTS Option for Create Table
orm: recognize byte slice and array in CreateTable
Remove query logger in favor OnQueryProcessed event.
Add QueryProcessedEvent helpers to get formatted and unformatted queries

Separate read and write buffers for Listener.
readme: add at least one example.
orm: fix query generation for joins and _.
InsecureSkipVerify and default database user name
Support CTE in UDATE and DELETE queries.
orm: ignore tableName of embedded struct.
orm: allow passing values to SelectAndCountEstimate.
orm: allow formatter to have both model params and struct/named params.
Allow omitting model column names and add examples.
orm: generate joins for count queries.
orm: quote aliases when generating joins.
orm: set DB for associated CTE.
orm: make Query.New to also copy model.
orm: remove Query.Alias that was not properly propagated everywhere.
Fix slice of ptrs handling and improve zeroing.
Detect relations on unexported struct types.
Fix table aliases in has one and belongs to joins.
Don't log error when listener is closed.
orm: add support for Having and WrapWith.
Add support for RETURNING in Delete.
Reset slice model when there is no data. Fixes #310.
Call AfterQuery only if there are returned rows.
orm: Apply func returns an error.
Make all fiels nullable by default.
internal/pool: more idiomatic work with channels.
Call AfterSelect hook after connection is freed.
internal/pool: fix reaper to close connections.
orm: make less retries in SelectOrCreate, but add backoff time.
orm: check for nil ptrs in isZero.
types: scan nil interface as JSONB.
orm: support multiple ON CONFLICT statements.
Use IsZero interface to check if value is empty.
Don't initialize model when there is no data.
orm: support db and model late binding.
Include remote addr in PostgreSQL errors.
Use unsafe to reduce number of allocations.
Add ability to change relation Query.
Fix slice model to work with slice of ptrs.
Add support for belongs to relation.
Don't try to process joins when there are no results.
Add WhereOr API to construct complex where conditions.
orm: use table alias to select all columns.
Add support for Query with nil Model.
types: fix scanning and appending interfaces.
orm: add API to set table alias.
orm: append table alias only when ON CONFLICT is used.
Release acquired DB connections in db.CopyTo()
orm: support where clause in do update queries.
Move SliceNextElem to internal package and reuse it.
orm: reduce number of allocation in many and m2m models.
orm: use field index in path.
Add Group and make Select more flexible.
Return an error when model does not have pks.
Add Set method to construct UPDATE queries.
Don't require special fields order to recognize has one relation. Improve example. Fixes #189.
Improve many to many relation support. Updates #180.
Properly detect primary keys in embedded structs. Fixes #177.
Return an error for unknown column.
Don't return an error on unknown column.
Simplify docs reading and add more examples.
Don't escape ? when formatting value recursively.
Append formatting errors to the query.
Don't return an error when there are not enough params.
Use bytes as backing storage for F.
Remove dreg of old chainable API.
Test more corner cases when converting values back and forth.
Restore optimized array appenders and scanners.
Replace decode with scan to speak in database/sql terms.
Don't set logger in tests since it confuses race detector.
Suppress logging in tests and benchmarks.
Add benchmark for has many relation.
CopyFrom now can be used in transaction
Revert examples. Model is not ready yet.
Change Result to be an interface.
Rename UseTimeout to WithTimeout to match context API.
Don't require users to write collections.
Log when listener discards bad connection.
Properly encode nil slices and maps. Fixes #76.
Add fast-path for decoding common values.
Remove db.Conn since it turned out to be an anti-pattern. Use pg.Tx instead.
Fix QueryOne with SHOW var; query.
stmt: make Stmt safe for concurrent use. Improve docs.
Increase default pool timeout to 5 seconds.
append: format struct as json by default.
Faster pool implementation based on Redis client.
Handle encoding pointer to the time.Time.
Decode bytes as JSON when struct is passed to the decoder.
Better rate limiter that does not leak goroutines.
Add ability to set run-time parameters. Remove automatic cancelRequest call. Use statement_timeout instead.
Support multiple statements within single connection. Fixes #23.
Support loading into multiple structs. Fixes #18.
Add support for Unix sockets. Fixes #14.
pool: prevent client from opening new connections too fast.
Remove text marshaller/unmarshaller support. Use sql.Scanner and driver.Valuer instead.
Use pg.v2 in import path everywhere
Treat timestamps without timezone as if they are in a Local timezone
Travis must always test current branch, not gopkg.in/pg.v1
Fix setting zero values on NULL (take two)
Use go syntax highlighting in readme
